inline.content:
- $MCG is integrated into the Rigami quest system as a deflationary token
- When $MCG is used to fund Rigami quests, the 3% platform fee is BURNED instead of collected
- This permanently reduces $MCG supply with every quest created
- Quest rewards are still paid to winners normally - only the fee portion is burned
- More quests = more burn = less supply = deflationary pressure

- Rigami is an AR-native social platform on Solana
- Tagline: "Where reality folds into imagination"
- Mission: Get people back outside through immersive extended reality experiences
- Combines XR, blockchain, and Proof of Reality
- Website: https://rigami.xyz
- X/Twitter: https://x.com/rigamixyz
- Team: Brian Cooper (@0xcoop, Cofounder & Chief Reality Officer) and blueberri (@0xblueberri, Cofounder & Chief Imagination Officer)
- Powered by Omni (https://omni.dev) Reality Development Kit

- Quests: On-chain bounties for real-world task completion, funded with SOL, USDC, or $MCG
- Thoughts: Location-anchored posts with mood indicators
- Map: 2D map view of location-anchored content
- World view (coming): AR 3D visualization
- Quest types: Solo (single funder, creator picks winner), Group (fixed reward per winner), Crowdfund (multiple contributors, predetermined payee), Community (multiple contributors, weighted voting over 48 hours)
- 3% platform fee on all quest funding (for $MCG this fee is burned)
- NFT minted as proof when a quest is completed
- Smart contract program ID: HKqfrfwPQxemzyTVZrpnAdL9Qg937Spz4uheH47R2Tur
- Supports Phantom, Backpack, and Brave wallets
- Early access - smart contracts have internal security reviews but are not formally audited
